results.overview: A young aggressive man from a small town goes to Amsterdam. He attacks several people, finds a girlfriend and takes her back home. Because of his misbehavior, this friendship ends soon afterwards.
results.title: Andy, bloed en blond haar

results.overview: Different kind of people arrives to Madrid airport. Some goes with their heads and others just landed. Fernando is a pilot who he brings a girl for his relatives. Ceferino and his wife have won a contest and will travel soon to Paraguay and they are there because they want to know the airplane. Mr. Beltran is very nervous because he returned to Spain after many years of exile.
results.title: Airport

results.overview: A bank clerk is driven by his brother-in-law in many adventures.
results.title: There's Always a Way to Find a Way

results.overview: Twenty years have passed since those two apartments in the heart of Mexico City were the battlefield of a war of the sexes between Ana, Carlos, Andrea, Miguel, Tomás and María. All that is left of those apartments are memories and the image of Tomás' dead body at the bottom of the elevator shaft. Their lives have changed, their families have grown and new and unexpected characters have come to unsettle their daily lives and trigger a chain of events that will make them realize that modesty has been replaced by public disclosure; sex is only an app away; but love...love is still something elusive that everyone in today's banal and chaotic world is seeking.
results.title: Sex, Shame and Tears 2

results.overview: A man goes on an all-inclusive vacation to the Caribbean and finds out he must share his room with someone else.
results.title: All Inclusive

results.overview: Merchant Marine sailors Joe Rossi (Humphrey Bogart) and Steve Jarvis (Raymond Massey) are charged with getting a supply vessel to Russian allies as part of a sea convoy. When the group of ships comes under attack from a German U-boat, Rossi and Jarvis navigate through dangerous waters to evade Nazi naval forces. Though their mission across the Atlantic is extremely treacherous, they are motivated by the opportunity to strike back at the Germans, who sank one of their earlier ships.
results.title: Action in the North Atlantic

results.overview: Efe Ajagba hopes to take a giant leap towards a title opportunity when faces upset-minded Australian Joe Goodall in a 10-round main event at Tahoe Blue Event Center in Lake Tahoe, Nevada.
results.title: Efe Ajagba vs. Joe Goodall

results.overview: Documentary about the fight for LGBTQ-rights in Sweden during the 1970s.
results.title: An Army of Lovers

results.overview: A resentful entity continues to come back to the Saha World in search of his lost love while battling against the secret guardians of the world. He fails his plan of trying to stay in this world but finds the true solution to his vengeance.
results.title: A Fiend's Love

results.original_title: Haunted Transylvania: Party Like A Jack-O’-Lantern
results.overview: Halloween is finally here and there's so much fun to be had in Haunted Transylvania! Brains the adorable zombie and Woof the werewolf pup are looking for Jackie, the magical Halloween pumpkin. Only she can give them the potion to make this Halloween the most frightful one! Rags the mummy who lives in Slimeville will give them the first clue, but they will first have to meet Fangs the tiny vampire to learn a protection spell to cross the spooky dungeons. Easy peasy, right? Not so fast! Will Daisy the ghost let them into the Pumpkin Patch? Find out in Haunted Transylvania: Party Like A Jack-O'-Lantern!
results.title: Haunted Transylvania: Party Like A Jack-O’-Lantern

results.overview: In pre-unified China, the King of Qin sends his concubine to a rival kingdom to produce an assassin for a political plot, but as the king's cruelty mounts she finds her loyalty faltering.
results.title: The Emperor and the Assassin

results.original_title: Gourmet Detective: Eat, Drink and Be Buried
results.overview: Henry and Maggie attend the birthday party of a local publisher, where his son and stepson reenact a historical 18th century dual. Someone, however, has loaded the antique pistol with a real musket ball, so when son pulls the trigger, he kills his stepbrother in front of a roomful of witnesses. Henry and Maggie have to figure out who wanted the stepson dead and why.
results.title: Gourmet Detective: Eat, Drink and Be Buried

results.overview: When a capable dancer is provoked by the evil design of his employer, naturally he will be out to prove his mettle.
results.title: ABCD

results.overview: Pediatric specialist Tasha Mason is focused on one thing; keeping the kids in her ward as healthy and happy as possible. So when her high-school crush, who just happens to be handsome Prince Alexander Cavalieri, breaks his leg on a nearby ski-slope, Tasha is forced to allow him to secretly get well on her floor and she’s furious that a spoiled Royal is interrupting the precious healing time her kids so badly need. Soon, however, Tasha learns that some tough love and a lot of Christmas spirit, could turn this royal pain into a knight in shining armor.
results.title: Christmas with a Prince

results.overview: An old-time crook plans a heist. When one of his two partners is found out to be a black man tensions flare.
results.title: Odds Against Tomorrow

results.overview: On his 89th birthday, renowned English broadcaster and naturalist Sir David Attenborough pays his first ever visit to the White House to be interviewed by one of his biggest fans, United States President Barack Obama.
results.title: David Attenborough Meets President Obama

results.overview: Julio, an only child belonging to a wealthy family, murders a prostitute who tries to seduce him. He, in childhood, suffered severe trauma and this causes serious problems with women. Because of this, runs away and stays in a boarding house in Madrid, where he meets Monica, the daughter of the owner, who maintains relationships that seek to build on for help in their desperate situation. As his obsession for killing is increasing.
results.title: The Killer Is Not Alone

results.overview: Drama of plot and intrigue in Imperial Russia.
results.title: The Adjutant of the Czar

results.overview: A love triangle between a man, two women and three children. When love suddenly explodes in these people's everyday lives, it creates a pressure wave that changes the lives of everyone.
results.title: Everyone Loves Alice

results.overview: A charismatic young woman's intelligent film about making the leap from supporting roles in German TV dramas to play the leading role in her own life. A courageous piece of performative autofiction which invents its own rules as it unfolds.
results.title: To Be an Extra
